description: Free backup software for personal users to protect important data by backing it up automatically. The software can create a data backup, disk, partition or the entire system; restore this data, disk, partition or system (even on different hardware); Clone a disk or partition to create a bootable disk allowing the restoration of previously saved data.A system requiring reinstallation can be easily restored by selecting the created image.
summary: Free backup software for personal users to protect important data by backing it up automatically.
author: EaseUS
